00020 
00021 struct UP {
00022       QPointF p;            // layout position relative to pos()
00023       QPointF off;          // user offset in spatium units
00024       mutable QRectF r;   // "grips"
00025       QPointF pos() const { return p + off * _spatium; }
00026       };
00027

00032 class SlurSegment : public Element {
00033       struct UP ups[4];
00034       QPainterPath* path;
00035 
00036       SlurTie* slur;
00037       RubberBand* rb;
00038       qreal bow;
00039 
00040       int mode;         // 0-4  0 - normal
00041 
00042       virtual void bboxUpdate();
00043       void updatePath();
00044       void updateGrips(QMatrix&);
00045 
00046    public:
00047       SlurSegment(SlurTie*);
00048       ~SlurSegment();
00049       SlurSegment(const SlurSegment&);
00050       virtual SlurSegment* clone() const { return new SlurSegment(*this); }
00051 
00052       void layout(const QPointF& p1, const QPointF& p2, qreal bow);
00053       virtual void resetMode();
00054 
00055       virtual QPointF dragOff() const;
00056       virtual bool contains(const QPointF& p) const;
00057 
00058       virtual void draw1(Painter&) const;
00059       virtual bool startEdit(QMatrix&);
00060       virtual void endEdit();
00061       virtual bool editStartDrag(const QPointF&);
00062       virtual bool editDrag(QMatrix&, QPointF*, const QPointF&);
00063       virtual bool editEndDrag();
00064       virtual bool edit(QKeyEvent* ev);
00065 
00066       virtual void move(qreal xd, qreal yd) { move(QPointF(xd, yd)); }
00067       virtual void move(const QPointF& s);
00068 
00069       SlurTie* slurTie() const     { return slur; }
00070       void setSlurTie(SlurTie* st) { slur = st; }
00071 
00072       void write(Xml& xml, int no) const;
00073       void read(QDomNode);
00074       void dump() const;
00075       };

00081 class SlurTie : public Element {
00082    protected:
00083       bool up;
00084       ElementList segments;

00086 
00087       QPointF slurPos(int tick, Staff* staff, int voice, System*& s);
00088 
00089    public:

00091       SlurTie(const SlurTie&);

00094 
00095       bool isUp() const                  { return up; }

00097       Direction slurDirection() const    { return _slurDirection; }

00099

00101       virtual void nextSeg(const QPointF, int, struct UP&)  {}
00102       virtual void prevSeg(const QPointF, int, struct UP&)  {}
00103       virtual void setSelected(bool f);
00104       virtual bool contains(const QPointF&) const { return false; }  // not selectable
00105
